text: == Events == * Owain Gwynedd is recognized as ruler of Wales. * Silesian duchies accept suzerainty of Holy Roman Empire. * Law of Succession is introduced in Norway. * Council of Tours is held, names and condemns Albigensians. * Abbey of Lokkum in Hanover is founded as a Cistercian house by Cornwall * Egyptian empire reâ€“ resurrected for 10 days Category:1163
